name: Tiny Planets (GamedevBram)
description:
Tiny Planets 🪐

The Universe is vast and endless. Who knows what kind of planets are out there?

Welcome to my Tiny Planet generator! Generate endless tiny universes, with infinitely many named planets and moons.

Countless Systems

 
Just keep pressing that Generate button for more!

Thousands of Unique Names

What is an Ykuic anyway?

Master over Time

Pause the planets to get a better look!

A big thanks to Kenney for providing great, free UI assets.
